tool_description: Abstractive Financial Summarization is a task in Natural Language Processing (NLP) that aims to generate a concise summary of a source text. ... Abstractive financial  summarization yields a number of applications in different domains, from books and literature, to science and R&D, to financial research and legal documents analysis.
name: Financial summarization
title: Financial summarization

api_list.name: fsummarize
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://financial-summarization.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/fsumm"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financial-summarization.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://financial-summarization.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/fsumm"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
